page.title: 04BRAMLEY WILDLIFE
page.content: Bramley has a great quantity of animals and wildlife mainly because Bramley is situated amongst lovely countryside. Along the roadside there is a great variety of plant life. There are flowers like{Bluebells,Forget-me-nots {Great Stitchwort }and {Feverfew } There are trees like {Oak, Ash, Horse {Chestnut }and {Willow.}In the hedgerows the most often sighted animal is the {Rabbit. }There are also different breeds of {Deer. Foxes }also live in the area hunting the various species of {Mice. }If you're lucky you might see a {Weasel }or a {Stoat. }The {Hawks}of the area are{Sparrowhawks}and {Kestrels,}and the occasional{Hen {Harrier.}A lot of wildlife can be seen if you obey the {COUNTRY CODE.}
